DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether fostamatinib is safe and effective in the treatment of IgA Nephropathy
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy Study of Fostamatinib to Treat Immunoglobin A (IgA) Nephropathy
